Docs.param: A object to complete.
Docs.summary: Completes a specified text composition.
Docs.returns: if the text composition was successfully completed; otherwise, .
Docs.exception: Raised when there is no input manager associated with *composition*, or when the text composition is already marked as completed.

Docs.summary: Occurs when a is completed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This is the tunneling version of this event. For the bubbling version, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>.
This is an attached event identified by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputEvent> field. Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.AddPreviewTextInputHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.RemovePreviewTextInputHandler%2A> methods to manage this event on a specified dependency object.
